0.4768, 0.5792 Q1.0.15 -> -2^0 to (2^0 - (1/2^15))
15624   18979
296527896 -> 32bit Q2.0.30
593055792 -> 32bit Q1.0.31
0.276163123548030853271484375
0.27616256

1.34576, 0.4768 -> 22049 15624 -> 22049 7812 -> 29861
Q1.1.14  Q1.0.15

23.597984136187275 * 7.545739171558353
Q2.13                Q3.12             = Q8.22

32 bit 64 bit so we have 32 gaurd bits 32 bits 34 to 0 33 to 17
